name: Cruel Programmer
description:
A Cruel Programmer who was frustrated from everything... decided to bring a robot to life.... Just to do experiments with him... Push him in the scenarios no one needs to face... What lies at the end of the robot's fate... who knows.....

Game submitted to Blackthornpod game jam under the "Less is More" theme...

The team that made it successful is:

Vishal (http://luffy703.itch.io/)

Khoa (https://buiminh-khoa.itch.io/)

John (https://soundcloud.com/user-829631810)

Josh (https://dios-jeans.itch.io/)

Steven (https://www.snicodemusart.com/)
